long_description: The Marmot Sphinx 15 pack keeps your climbing essentials within easy reach and offers motivating comfort while you're gaining altitude step by step. Compression-molded and perforated foam back panel helps ensure ventilation; curved shoulder straps, sternum strap and a removable webbing hipbelt create a comfortable harness. Panel-loading main compartment is accessed via a large, D-shaped zipper; it contains a zippered hydration sleeve (reservoir not included) and dual internal gear loops. Zippered front pocket holds an accessory organizer and key clip; stretch-mesh side pockets, ice-axe loops and interior/exterior gear loops enhance gear-organizing options. The Marmot Sphinx 15 pack is made with 210-denier and 420-denier nylon; reflective accents increase visibility in dim light. Closeout.
short_description: The Marmot Sphinx 15 pack keeps your climbing essentials within easy reach and offers motivating comfort while you're gaining altitude step by step.
